name: Fight For Pay
detailed_description:
In 2024， Taxpayer Hell’s End Island was covered a kind of unknown inert gas.Humanbeing cannot live in the island. In 2025, Centurion Ltd acquired THE lsland.
Centurion Ltd: the company offer huge credit loans for people all of the world.In 2027, the company hold a show 《Fight For Pay》and global broadcast.
Contestants need get subsistence energy Constantly in the show，“Creed” and weapons is a key to win.



Creed·Battle Assist System is a special equipment for the contestants，it has powerful features：Subsistence System、Random skills、Battle Modules and other features。Contestants require use tactics through “Creed”.





The “Creed” provides a Subsistence System so that player characters can survive in the inactive gas. When player characters run out of energy in the Subsistence System, their HP will start to gradually reduce. Player characters can use recharging devices that appear at random locations to regain energy or steal other player characters’ energy.





The “Creed” gives each player a random skill every game, allowing players to make decisions based on their individual playstyle. Skills can be changed and upgraded by killing other players.





Battle modules can be put on the “Creed”. Battle modules can stimulate player’s corresponding potential, awarding them corresponding special battle abilities.

short_description: FIGHT FOR PAY is a new generation Strategic survial shooting game.Players could find the freshness in each match.To win the match,Configure the skills，use the abillities ,refit the weapon is necessary.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 10.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: (64bit versions required)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64bit versions required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 1080 3GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 10.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: (64bit versions required)
